title: Social Network Utilization Strategies for Online Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Mobile-based course focused on enhancing science learning competencies through social networks, targeting working professionals (administrative/managerial) and university students

learning_goals: Learners can effectively utilize social network platforms (e.g., wikis, forums, hashtag-based collaboration tools) for scientific problem-solving
Learners can perform peer assessment and feedback processes with over 80% accuracy using online collaboration tools
Learners can analyze social learning data to explain their learning patterns using at least three metrics
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
